General.Name: Hong Leong Industries Bhd
General.Description: Hong Leong Industries Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells consumer and industrial products in Malaysia, Australia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Taiwan, and internationally. The company manufactures, assembles, and distributes motorcycles, scooters, and related parts and products; and manufactures and sells ceramic tiles. It also manufactures and sells fiber cement products; and distributes, trades in, and provides services in marine related products. In addition, the company is involved in the rental of properties. The company was formerly known as Fancy Tile Works Limited and changed its name to Hong Leong Industries Berhad in 1979. The company was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Hong Leong Industries Berhad is a subsidiary of Hong Leong Manufacturing Group Sdn Bhd.
